fullplot: It's a Crime to Steal a Baby! But What if it's Your Brother? H (18), Casey (14) and baby Severino have been split up after their mother's death. Casey is in foster care; Severino is about to be adopted, and no one really cares what H (Taylor) does.
plot: A 14-year-old leads his two half-brothers (one older, one an infant) on a journey to find and live as a family with his father after their mother dies.
title: Some Dogs Bite
